text: is a Japanese former cyclist. He competed in the individual road race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. He also competed at the 1982 and 1986 Asian Games. He served as one of the coaches for the Japanese cycling team at the 2012 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Japan Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Akita Prefecture Category:Japanese Olympic coaches Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Matsuyoshi Takahashi
